title: Setup script for more collaborators
body:
Hi!

Setting up a cloned repo to create PRs is quite cumbersome, especially due to the native skia submodule.
Getting that to build on a windows machine is quite a hassle.

It would be so nice if there was an (optional) setup script installing all the stuff required to actually build skia and also building it.
Or at least have a good documentation. (I know it is not on you to document how to build skia, but every time I have I struggle quite a bit to eventually get it to compile...)

So this is just a "hope it will be implemented some time" "issue" - kind of a reminder ;-)
